subject: Re: [EVP-ITC] Harrogate, Yorkshire UK
author: Lisby
full_text:
HI Ray--I think I've either been to your site, or somehow run across  
this EVP before. Welcome!

Ann

On Jun 20, 2008, at 2:00 PM, Ray wrote:

> Hi everyone just to introduce myself. I'm Ray from Yorkshire England,
> I've been doing research into EVP for a while now and always on the
> lookout for improved techniques and better results. Just uploaded my
> first file under Ray's File's. I obtained this EVP while exploring a
> disused Lead Mine here in Yorkshire I was alone and armed with a torch
> and Olympus VN-120pc digital voice recorder. If you loop the file you
> can hear the noise of dripping water from the roof of the Mine and a
> distinct voice saying "help Me"
>
> Thanks
> Ray
>
>
>
